film.title: Timecop
film.summary: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

guestOne.name: Nick Kroll
guestOne.bio: Nick Kroll is dearly beloved here at Earwolf, in case you can’t tell from the El Chupcabra tag on the Earwolf theme. His characters , be they Bobby Bottleservice, Fabrice Fabrice, or Randy Moss’ Dog, are forever welcome on our shows. He’s a quick improviser and hilarious stand-up, and you can watch his special Thank You Very Cool or the semi-improvised The League for verification on that. His credits are unending, and incredibly impressive. So, like no offense none taken, we love him.

results.episodeDescription: Nick Kroll (Oh, Hello on Broadway, The House) returns to join Paul, June, and Jason to discuss the 1994 Jean-Claude Van Damme movie Timecop. Recorded live from Austin, Texas, they cover JCVDs grief mullet, actor/activist Ron Silvers nut work, the confusing time travel, and much more.
